title: LFT or LF Duo | Main Support/Mid
body:
Currently I am in Gold 4, am really keen on rank team or just duo partner. If you are interested or want to have a practice game to see if i work well with the team/player just added me, I am on almost every night and do have communication (Skype,curse,teamspeak,etc) 

Support Roles :{{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:40}}  (Best Support Thresh/Janna)

Mid Roles: {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:115}} (Best Mid Lux/Brand)
